channel.title: Shop price?
channel.description: simple question... how do i change the price of e shop item?

item.title: Shop price?
item.dc:creator: @Master_Monk Master Monk
item.description:
@Master_Monk wrote:

[quote=“N0vlafe, post:3, topic:257583”][quote author=Master Monk link=topic=340047.msg2635869#msg2635869 date=1232503487]
Say it was a…Torags Plate…
Search 4749 then you will see something like…

tem = 4749	Torags_platebody	Torag_the_Corrupted's_plate_body_armour.	165189.356390367	165189.356390367	222355.191670643	0	0	0	0	0	122	120	107	-6	132	0	0

Your Ganna want to change this

165189.356390367	165189.356390367	222355.191670643

say you wanted to make it 1 Million Gp Just Change the Whole numbers in the 3 numbers to 1000000 like…

1000000.356390367	1000000.356390367	1000000.191670643

Tip: Remember to use Tabs for spaces!

This is probobly not the best way to do it, this is just how i do it
[/quote]

you didn’t even tell where to go, fail[/quote]

Atleast i go and tell people how it works? and not just say Fail…All you had to say was “You forgot to tell him where it is…its in item.cfg”

That simple?

Read full topic
